title: Need to have common platform for ease of EV charging: Mercedes
description: Mercedes-Benz India has urged the government to create a unified platform for real-time information on charging stations to enhance convenience for electric vehicle owners. This move aims to simplify the charging process and encourage EV adoption. Currently, multiple apps are needed, making it cumbersome for users.
